author: matirdaeg
title: Cardano Creatives Swarm community
description: There is a lack of incentives and environments to allow blockchain use cases a direct interaction with cultural and artistic initiatives.
solution: Exploring and establishing an environment of social and cultural inclusion to support, facilitate and generate culture and arts movements.
experience: Studies in Architecture, Ecological construction, craft, History of art and Sociology. Psychological and pedagogical consultant and Advisor.
